import math
def ncr(n,r):
    f=math.factorial
    return f(n)/(f(r)*f(n-r))
def main():
    t=int(input())
    while t>0:
         
        ar=map(int,raw_input().split())
        """  for i in range (0,11)
            print ar[i] """
        k=int(input())
        ans=1
        c=0
        ar.sort()
        temp=ar[11-k]
        
        h=11-k
        
        for i in  range(h,11):
        	if(ar[i]==temp):
        		c=c+1
        	else:
        		break
        n=0
        for i in range(0,11):
        	if(ar[i]==temp):
        		n=n+1
           
        g=ncr(n,c)
        print g
        t=t-1
    return 0
main()
